website_summaries.verdict: With its slim design, fantastic screen, and oodles of power, the Samsung Galaxy Tab S 8.4 is a superb smaller tablet, and a worthy competitor to the ever-popular iPad Mini.
pros: The Samsung Galaxy Tab S 8.4 is extremely slim, has a gorgeous, super-high-definition display, tonnes of power, and the latest version of Android KitKat on board
cons: It's packed full of so much bundled software from Samsung and third parties that it will likely be confusing for first-time Android users

customer_reviews.title: Good performance, terrible battery life.
customer_reviews.text: pros: the 8.4 is the perfect size for reading, streaming videos. I am able to hold in one hand comfortably. I've downloaded several games from play store and all seem to be working well, with no stuttering (mostly flight sims) fast, responsive. nice screen resolution. cons: extremely poor battery life. 3-4 hours and must be recharged. even in idle, it dies overnight. I have a 1st generation ipad which STILL gets through an entire day on its battery after 5 years. Samsung is known for their weak batteries, but c'mon guys, you've had years to figure this out. Silly bloatware. spent an hour turning off/uninstalling unnecessary samsung crap. Still did not help the battery life, though.
customer_reviews.author: C. Parrott

customer_reviews.title: Works great and the graphics are impressive
customer_reviews.text: Works great and the graphics are impressive. Gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because the microSD card slot doesn't snap the card secure in place; I have to hold it in with finger pressure until I'm done with whatever I'm doing to transfer files for storage or installation. Not a big enough deal for me to return it, especially since the USB cable can be used to do these operations from the computer. If I was in need of having an SD card affixed in the device for any length of time then I would want it repaired under warranty or replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony(RI)

customer_reviews.title: You watch movies and can read so good
customer_reviews.text: Going to take one star off for possible fragility in screen burn with all Samsung products. But man am I spoiled, resolution is better than my TV. I also use this as a monitor for my DSLR camera via bluetooth. Get this one if you watch movies, Netflix, Prime or YouTube videos. The rectangular format is great for that. Get the other ones in the square format if you read ebooks. I personally read the times, flipboard and ebooks with no issues but some like the nook format.
customer_reviews.author: import_logistics

customer_reviews.title: Great Start! No Staying Power! Update: Repaired FREE!
customer_reviews.text: i bought this Device in October of 2014. In October of 2017 it has irretrievably died. Goes to the SAMSUNG screen on the front as though it is signing in and remains there until the battery dies. Very Disappointing. Update...I called Samsung to ask if there was a repair facility that I could send it to. After telling my story, the tech said, "Send it in. We will fix it FREE" and they did. I can only hope he didn't lose his job. It works like new. Probably saved me over $200. I wrote a glowing review for the tech (sparing details that could be dangerous for him) but never heard back from his boss.
customer_reviews.author: Saxman_83201

customer_reviews.title: handy, functional and elegant
customer_reviews.text: The best! it's handy, functional and elegant, i enjoy gold/titanium bronze blend a lot. For my need it answers great. I'm a Galaxy S5 user an the Sidesync it's helpful. It sounds great, mail and office apps works perfect. I'm only waiting for android 6 Marshmallow upgrade, hope it comes soon because Kit Kat interface don't look so fine in this tablet. About the finish design, it's so much better than Tab S2, that leaves much to be desired. Maybe the only one weakness is the 16 GB Flash Memory, fortunately... it comes with 128 GB expandable memory slot ;)
customer_reviews.author: Diego P.

customer_reviews.title: and it is still running pretty well. I have updated it up to the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this tablet since 2014 and have taken it to many trips across Asia and in Southern California, and it is still running pretty well. I have updated it up to the current android version (Marshmallow?) and it does not seem to slow down. I don't really use it for taking pictures, but they seem to take comparable photos to my Note 4 (which is a year newer to this tablet). My primary usage for this tablet is reading books from the kindle app, and watching Korean Dramas from time to time. So all in all if it still runs, I am going to keep using this tablet until it breaks down (hopefully not to soon!!)
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Meily

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I had it when it first came out new, and I loved it so much. I was bummed that they no longer offer new versions of it so I looked for it online. I spent over $100 and it literally only lasted 5 months. It won't charge, and even taking it to a repair shop where they bought some replacement parts, it still wouldn't work. They said it had something to do with the motherboard. So I only had it for 5 months and now I have to either recycle it or throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a tablet to use as an e-reader, and this is perfect. It's the right size to fit in my hand comfortably, it's very light, and the screen is big enough that it feels like I'm reading a book and not a smartphone screen. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Murali

customer_reviews.title: Good Tablet, great screen
customer_reviews.text: I have had this tablet for a few months now. I love the bright colorful screen. I have not had a chance to test it out in sunlight, but it seems very bright indoors. The battery life seems adequate for a tablet. The Samsung UI could use some work, can be hard to find the right settings. The fingerprint scanner works..barely. You have to swipe at the right speed/direction to get it to trigger. You have about 5 tries to get it right, then it looks you out for 30 seconds, this happens enough that it can be annoying. Its nice that this includes an micro-SD card slot, as the storage quickly fills up. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Roth

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use on the cardio equipment at the gym, so I could bring my own video. This tablet was highly recommended for that purpose, and it does work well for that. The screen is VERY fine. The only issue I have is that, being used to Nexus phones, meaning vanilla Android, I was a bit disconcerted to find they'd reverse the left and right Android buttons at the bottom of the screen. Also, I really don't need the crudware the tablet comes with. I wish they'd just make good, compliant hardware which ran basic Android. If I want more than that, I'll load it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Howard S. Shubs

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant, Vivid Screen
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best screen I've ever seen. Brilliant, vivid colors and sharp images. I really like the virtual keyboard. It's BIG! and accomodates my pudgy old fingers so I don't have to re-enter passwords, etc., several times. Sound quality of the internal speakers is satisfactory for my 75 year old ears - very good through my Bose ear buds. I've taken several photos and a couple of videos and they turned out way better than I expected. Also successfully scanned some barcodes which I've always had trouble with whenusing other devises. I am totally pleased with this tablet and recommend anyone looking to buy similar devices please take a close look at this one. I think you'll like it!
customer_reviews.author: Lance Bowen

customer_reviews.title: I compared this alongside that tab S2 because they seem ...
customer_reviews.text: I compared this alongside that tab S2 because they seem to have similar specs just different aspect ratio and all. Despite the numbers this unit was significantly slower. Most likely due to all the bloatware and extract apps that were added on at the factory. When I had to update to the newest version it supported 6.0, it went through almost 200 apps as it completed the update. On the S2 it literally only had to go through 20 apps. Also the S2 t713 features Android 7.0
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: this has worked just great. This is my first tablet and I am ...
customer_reviews.text: Every once in a long while it'll freeze and I'll have to restart it, but despite being refurbished, this has worked just great. This is my first tablet and I am pleased with its performance. I specifically got this one for a trip abroad where I knew I would be sitting on a lot of trains, so I picked one with good processing power and a nice screen. Combined with the lower price for being refurbished, and this was definitely the right choice to make.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet that's worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great tablet! I was upgrading from one of the original Nexus 7s. The difference is huge. The Tab S is so much faster it's absurd. The screen is gorgeous. The extra inch of screen size really makes a difference when browsing the web or editing documents. Cons: Price Samsung's bloatware. The good news is, while you can't uninstall all the Samsung apps, you can turn them off and they really don't get in the way. If you don't want to use them, you don't have to. Overall, I really love this tablet. I use several hours a day, every day.
customer_reviews.author: Luke B

customer_reviews.title: Great Samsung Tablet, worth the money 100%
customer_reviews.text: Its a great tablet: Pros: Great display, bright colors, fast processor, easy to hold in one hand due its great size, it also comes with a lot of useful apps. The camera is good, not great but is fast to get pics. Responds pretty well in multitask mode. Cons: Battery is not great, its very important to use the battery Power save mode and adjust the screen brightness to auto (many people might find auto display mode quite anoying). I would believe Samsung could add a pair of headphones or at least for a good price because the tablet can hold uo to 128 Gb of extra storage. To me is the best small tablet until today.
customer_reviews.author: RZC

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best tablet I've ever used. The screen is beautiful, my phone has an amoled screen and it has the expected drawbacks ("linen" look, aura), but I only see that on the Galaxy Tab S when I have the brightness turned way down and I'm really looking for it. The OS is very snappy and responsive, none of the delay and slowness I've seen with other Android tablets. I'm not a fan of the touchwiz interface but I'm giving it a chance to grow on me. Battery life isn't great at full brightness but it can still survive the majority of a day at a reasonable brightness.
customer_reviews.author: A. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet Still Has Some Issues
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with 128 gb samsung evo mircrosdxc card. Samsung reps don't know their butt from there elbow they all give you a different answer. One made me wipe my device. I purchased a sandisc 64 gb sdxc card and it worked no problem. So i pretty much have it eliminated down to the size of 128gb is not compatible even tho it says it is. Sound is ok I kinda liked my ipad air 2 sound better. Screen is amazing however the touchscreen is too sensitive and does a lot of unwanted inputs. (screen protector did help) aside from that i love it!!! Just fix the storage issue
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Lozada

customer_reviews.title: Nice screen, speedy processing, but frustrating sometimes.
customer_reviews.text: In many ways a very nice media device, but sometimes frustrating. My machine occasionally suddenly will reboot itself without warning, and may do so several times in a short time. It also will flicker when it is having that problem. I don't run games or watch movies much, just low demand media mostly. The other frustration is Samsungs tweak of Android means some apps don't run, and you are locked in to their u.i. The music app is also not intuitive. I can't seem to add new albums (??), so I now use Google's music app instead.
customer_reviews.author: DrDMac

customer_reviews.title: Never have any problems it is fast and wonderful just wish it came in a 64-128 model
customer_reviews.text: Use it all the time, Never have any problems it is fast and wonderful just wish it came in a 64-128 model. Would love to see a note version(the note versions of galaxy come with a styles built in) I prefer this then my big 10 Note as it fits in my purse easier and I can both write lesson plans and borrow other teachers ideas off pintrest on it and then hand it to my ten year old to play minecraft. Yes it is in a big otterbox defender case. the otterboxes are so worth every penny! as is this tablet
customer_reviews.author: Jane doe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful screen, fast and responsive
customer_reviews.text: I named this tablet when I set it up as "Cadillac of tablets" - for it is. Beautiful screen, fast and responsive! Unfortunately the bloatware installed by Samsung has never been seen before! The warranty is essentially worthless, because you immediately must root it to remove Samsung's junk software. Once fifty or more worthless programs are removed, this thing has completely replaced my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: iconicj

customer_reviews.title: The tablet is great but it glitches and restarts from time to time
customer_reviews.text: The tablets features are great. But three months using it I noticed it began to glitch and restart from time to time. It is very annoying! Note that I didnt drop it or anything of the sort. I think the glitch may have to do with the fact that the tablet I purchased was refurbished. If I had purchased a brand new one, I'm sure I wouldn't be dealing with this problem.I hope a refund or exchange is still possible.
customer_reviews.author: Your Gal

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Device....
customer_reviews.text: Almost Perfect.... The size is great; easy to handle and carry. The screen is outstanding; best I have seen on any tablet. Battery life is very good. The tablet is fast and responsive. Build quality is superb. Consider getting the Samsung simple case for your tablet. It attaches to the back, adds no bulk, and protects the screen perfectly. The Samsung TouchWiz interface is good, but it does have its limitations. I will look into third party launchers to bypass TouchWiz. Otherwise, this is an excellent purchase. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent perfromance and brilliant screen
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife to replace an ASUS Zenpad that was starting to get erratic (screen & charging problems). This refurbed Samsung tablet looks and runs like new. I had to hunt to find a tiny scratch on the back. Performance and screen are outstanding. Android promptly updated itself to the latest level, my wife's apps were soon re-installed, and she is up and running and quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Gary RV_Wizard

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME TABLET
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tablet! Bought it after seeing a friends. Amoled display super sharp and vibrant. Like having the ability to add a SD card. Speakers OK but could be better. Very fast with its octa core processor and 3 gigs of ram. Personally I think the 8.4 is the perfect size...I have owned a 7 inch tablet and thought was too small...a friend has a 10.5 and I think too big. I've owned several Samsung phones (my wife and I both currently own Note 4s) and have never been disappointed...now I can say the same about their tablets.
customer_reviews.author: DNA

customer_reviews.title: Best in class
customer_reviews.text: Clearly the best attempt at a tablet. You can hear all about the specs, display, etc. everywhere. My big thing is that this is the best form factor for a portable/mobile device. With a slim fold-over case it will fit in a men's coat pocket, with the Samsung keyboard it is a solid mobile workstation. Movies on-the-go are an added 1st class bonus - the best anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: C. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: ... this tablet for a year now and still really love it. Only issues I've had are OS updates
customer_reviews.text: I've had this tablet for a year now and still really love it. Only issues I've had are OS updates; the tablet itself is great -- beautiful display and excellent features. I've always been disappointed that it didn't have a better camera though. 8MP seems low when the Galaxy phones already had 13MP before this was released. Either way, this thing is really stylish and having the ability to add an SD card really helps.
customer_reviews.author: Brian L.

customer_reviews.title: Great, except for the system software.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing piece of hardware shackled to a completely garbage Samsung customized version of Android. This is easily a 5/5 star product save the firmware; the screen is amazing, battery life is great and processing power is perfect. There are custom firmware out there that improve the situation (unofficial CM12 builds exist) but none of them function flawlessly. If Samsung's new touchwiz update for android 5 is actually decent this will be a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk Diggler

customer_reviews.title: Fast, beautiful, lightweight tablet that will meet entertainment needs
customer_reviews.text: Upgrading from a Samsung Note 8.0 from a few years ago. Was looking at 10" screens like a Sony Experia Z4, but very expensive at the time of purchase. Purchased this on an Amazon Warehouse deal for a great price and item never looked used. I believe for my needs the Tab S 8.4 fits my needs perfectly. I play games, do some Kindle reading and watch Netflix. I'm not in the apple ecosystem so never will consider an apple product.
customer_reviews.author: Castiel

customer_reviews.title: but for the same price now (March 2016) you can get something newer and better spec'd.
customer_reviews.text: When it worked it was 5 stars. But it broke shortly after the warranty ended. At first it would turn off anytime I touched the screen when it dropped below 40%charged. Now it turns off when I touch the screen when it is below 77% charged. I'm sure I just got a lemon. I would buy this again if the price dropped, but for the same price now (March 2016) you can get something newer and better spec'd.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Nice tablet
customer_reviews.text: Purchased "factory refurbished" product from seller VIPOUTLET. Unboxed item, powered it on and immediately noticed an image burned in the screen. Returned it for a refund. Purchased another refurbished from BlinQ. Item has a few scratches on screen but so far is working well.
customer_reviews.author: Nathanael

customer_reviews.title: I spend more time using this then my 2K desktop.
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time researching which tablet to get, and I couldn't be happier with my choice. The screen looks amazing, the unit is light and attractive, and the performance is top class. The only issue I have is that the battery runs down rather quickly with the screen lighting up high...but then again I will sit and use it to play games for hours on end so I'm really expecting the impossible. It's one of those things that you buy and you aren't sure how you lived without it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watch from whom you buy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Tab refurbished. Came defective. I was extremely disappointed and started to do a return. I was able to identify the issue and resolve it by opening the tablet. If I wanted to that, I could've bought it defective and saved money. Modest price still thru the seller(ocean reefs). Had it came has promised, easy 4 to 5 stars. It's in working condition now. It does all I need it to do. Can handle games and videos well. Just as long as you keep an eye on it. Meaning don't have 15 different apps open. 3 stars because of hassle of repairing the tablet. Actual product 4.2/5
customer_reviews.author: Timothy T.

customer_reviews.title: Bought two tables
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet just my luck I got one with a ghost image on the screen. Sucks that I had to pay for shipping to get it back to them. Quality control didn't do their job right. Bought a second tablet it got a broken tablet. Within 2 min of turning it on it would turn off. Both tablets came from BINQ
customer_reviews.author: charlie brown

customer_reviews.title: I was hooked when I saw the screen
customer_reviews.text: I love the screen resolution. I purchased mainly to surf and look at pictures online. The camera is a little slow for my tastes, but the quality of picture is nice if it holds still. I have had Mac products for exclusively for 10 years. I was thinking about a tablet and saw my brother's. I appreciate the price vs. the Mac equivalent. I don't need a tablet for music so I am not concerned about syncing my library of songs. There is an app to help transferring files like pictures between this and my mac, so I am content.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Babic

customer_reviews.title: Nice tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is my first tablet but my fiancé has an original ipad mini. The screen resolution and clarity is amazing! Display looks so much nicer than her ipad. Simple to use. I like the ability to dictate email etc. rather than having to type everything. I have also used the GPS with Google maps and it works great for that. Battery life is good. Speakers sound pretty good too. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Z

customer_reviews.title: Performance/appearance wise I've had no issues when the device is working like it was out-of-the-box
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this tablet for about 8 months now. At this point I'm starting to get screen flickering often followed by device restarts. Looking into this it seems to be a common problem Samsung has had with their tablets and requires a re-solder of a battery connector. Performance/appearance wise I've had no issues when the device is working like it was out-of-the-box, but buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much, we bought a second one for our daughter.
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these. But mine from Best Buy and then this one for my daughter. Make sure you go through your settings and clear out all the unneeded apps/functions to prolong your battery life. Only issue I have found is that the bottom control lights sometimes stay on and you have to reset the tablet to get them to go off. Otherwise, great picture quality, vivid screen images, sound quality is good. I use mine for basic Internet uses but mostly to read from my Kindle app. Would not trade it for anything else. Great size and it fits in my purse easily.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Buy this tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a Google Nexus 7, Acer Iconia, Samsung Galaxy 3, 4 and now this tablet. By far this Galaxy Tab is my favorite in every way imaginable. I actually prefer this Samsung Galaxy Tab 8.4 to my Acer Iconia tab 10. The screen contrast and colors are beautiful. It's like watching my TV on a tablet. It's fast and can multitask without any problems. So far it has never crashed or even had a frozen screen.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Pro-stock tablet for sure.
customer_reviews.text: Oh my what a rush this very impressive tablet pesents. I've owned a few tablets ie. Ipad, ipad mini (with and without retna display) and the kindle hdx. I've enjoyed them all but, this Samsung Galaxy Tab S is setting the tablet bar higher than I could have imagined. The android learning curve is easier than I thought too.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Irvin

customer_reviews.title: It fell on concrete.... and that's all she wrote.
customer_reviews.text: It fell on concrete.... and that's all she wrote. Can't blame the device because my daughter dropped it one too many times. The tab is of great quality and I recommend a Samsung Tab over any of the ehm-pads any time of the day. We have couple of other Tabs that have survived years of abuse without a hiccup. This one just happen to fall on uneven concrete completely flat. We are in the process of trying to have it covered by AMEX protection.
customer_reviews.author: b.deren

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S lives up to the hype.
customer_reviews.text: I decided after extensive research concerning the multitude of tablets available to purchase this marvel of technology and I am very happy with that decision. The Galaxy Tab S certainly lives up to all the advertising superlatives with it's superb screen resolution and snappy task execution. It does however have some minor irksome irritations, firstly, in my opinion it is shipped with far too many pre-loaded apps of which many cannot be uninstalled. Secondly, as a first time smartphone/tablet user I found the Samsung "TouchWiz" app interface very cumbersome so I loaded the "Nova" alternative which I find a lot more intuitive. I highly recommend this digital marvel.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished my ass.
customer_reviews.text: Complete junk, bought a "refurbished" had to return asap almost couldn't even factory reset it to return it.
customer_reviews.author: CharlieBrown

customer_reviews.title: And it has a wonderful display. Samsung needs to get rid of the ...
customer_reviews.text: The OS is not close to haveing the same options to personaize as the same OS on the Samsung phone. Way to much trash is installed, of it much your not able to delete. It's fast though. And it has a wonderful display. Samsung needs to get rid of the amount of trash that takes up room in memory. make it so you can customize it like the phone which runs the same version of kit kat.
customer_reviews.author: Andhonor

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet, I love this thing. Excellent replacement for my Nexus 7. I would write more but ther is already a wealth on info in the reviews. But if you have a question not already answered, feel free to ask.
customer_reviews.author: Cms3717

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and the speed. The display is very dynamic. Absolutely beautiful. I am partial the galaxy products and the Tab S did not disappoint. It's great for viewing and editing documents, watching movies, and playing games. My only regret is not getting the one with a sim card slot, but for now I Bluetooth tether with my s5 and it works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Don't trust a refurb?
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a week, now it flashes and reboots itself intermittently and without warning. Quite frustrating. Vendor has not responded. Received tablet on June 20th
customer_reviews.author: Greg Lester

customer_reviews.title: Still the best tablet ever made
customer_reviews.text: Still the best tablet ever made. Incredible clear graphics. I've read the comments the its slow. But i've not noticed anything about it that is slow. I think there is too much desire out there for the fastest and best graphics that there is a faster system coming out every so many months. Its too bad Amazon went backwards in technology for their newest tablets.
customer_reviews.author: irishjdf

customer_reviews.title: very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I won't bore you with the info from the other reviews but to say that I was concerned that the screen was going to be too small. It's so portable and light I won't trade the convenience for the bigger screen. I tuck it in my jeans back pocket and I'm off. The screen resolution is so sharp that everything looks great on it. Totally pleased and saved a buck 50 compared to the 10.1.
customer_reviews.author: Royco

customer_reviews.title: This one is a great size. Big enough for viewing but not so ...
customer_reviews.text: SOLID tablet. And I've had tons. This one is a great size. Big enough for viewing but not so big it gets heavy after reading or watching a movie for a bit. And the 3 GB of RAM makes this bad boy scream. The screen is unreal. I had a Nexus 9 but returned it due to size and weird ratio, I had the Nvidia Shield but it was bulky and heavy. This one is a homerun.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon West

customer_reviews.title: Great device, definitely happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Love the device! The screen is amazing and everything is very smooth. My only negative is that Amazon Prime Videos is not supported. This however was not a fault of the gallery but rather a mistake in research. I had read that Amazon Prime Videos was being opened to android and I jumped on the Tab S immediately. Only to food or that Amazon only opened it for android phones not tablets. I hope a release to android galleys is in the near future. I still think I would have purchased over the Fire HDX because of play market and screen size, but access to prime videos would make me at least think about a Fire.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas luebbering

customer_reviews.title: Has drool factor
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous Display...wonderful for video watching. Not sure what android version shipped on it but it has updated to 5.0.2 within days of owning. Lots of ways to customize it. No problems so far and I have been using it a lot. Regarding cases, bear in mind that most have fold back front covers that make using the camera awkward - fyi when looking for cases if you buy it.
customer_reviews.author: lesley9

customer_reviews.title: Good Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I owned a Samsung Tab 4 10.1'' Tablet before purchasing this as a replacement when it was stolen, and this tablet came in handy during college, it's much lighter and small to carry around but after some time the battery life hasn't been so reliable as before.
customer_reviews.author: Shanice

customer_reviews.title: Just recently got the Lollipop upgrade and battery life is great. Runs everything I throw at it without breaking ...
customer_reviews.text: This Tab is a beast! Just recently got the Lollipop upgrade and battery life is great. Runs everything I throw at it without breaking a sweat. I'm very happy with this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: James B Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this tablet. Speed is great and the screen is stunning. It feels solid. I've had it for a couple of months and no issues at all. Games and videos run great. Skype too, perfect on a good wifi connection. Rear camera is not as good as my Galaxy S5 phone, but good enough. But really, it's not cool to take pictures with your tablet in public.
customer_reviews.author: Southplank

customer_reviews.title: it is so amazing looking at the screen of the TAB S
customer_reviews.text: OLED. Nuff said! :) This display technology has no equal...it is so amazing looking at the screen of the TAB S...colors really pop out and very intense. My Instagram feed has never looked so good. Buy this for the OLED screen if your main use case is browsing social media sites or watching Youtube/Netflix/Hulu on the device.
customer_reviews.author: The Mississauga Mangler

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Delivers on all fronts with a beautiful display and flawless speed with no transition delays. Everything I wanted in a tablet! Plays games such as Clash of Clans without difficulty or stuttering.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M.

customer_reviews.title: A most excellent choice !
customer_reviews.text: Downsized from an ASUS with internal keybooard and am very happy. Easy to learn, excellent screen, light weight, battery so-so like all others so I carry spare battery packs. Way tooo much bloatware that you cannot delete (minus one star). I am very happy with my purchase and it pairs very well with my Samsung phone.
customer_reviews.author: KMK

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful screen, solid build
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful screen, solid build, works fine. My only complaint is all the bloatware that Samsung adds to the device, much of it that can't be deleted. I've had Nexus tablets and phones and am a fan of the mostly vanilla Android experience. That being said, I would certainly recommend the Galaxy S Tab line. It is a very good device for media content consumption.
customer_reviews.author: BillyJim47

customer_reviews.title: I love this tablet!
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is awesome! I upgraded from a Google tablet, and this thing rocks. The display is very bright and crisp with excellent resolution and color reproduction. The processor is very fast resulting in very smooth video, gaming, surfing, etc. The micro-SD card slot allows plenty of room for movies, music, etc. The touchscreen is responsive and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: amland1

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy Tab S 8.4 inch tablet
customer_reviews.text: I am loving it. The screen is just the right size. I plan to use it for travel because even with a light weight case it weighs less than my Kindle Fire HD with a similar light weight case does. It connects to the internet quickly. I am still getting used to the picture taking aspect, but they show beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: C. Parson

customer_reviews.title: Best performance for my usage
customer_reviews.text: Best performance for my usage. Good screen but you can see big pixel blocks in dark scenes in videos. I also need to turn off all the lights for dark scenes of movies because its hard to see. Battery is just average. With wifi on downloading torrent, web surfing from time to time and only 25% of brightness I can only reach 7 hours. 9 hours if I'll use it up to 5% of battery but power saving is on when it start to have 25% charge. I think you can use it for 10 to 11 hours with power saving on all the time without gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Mac43

customer_reviews.title: Does it all!
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated a bit before buying this tablet because of the price but once I saw my dad got one and he was happy with it I pulled the trigger and I'm very happy with it. My only complain with this product is that the volume and lock buttons are on the same side one below the other and sometimes I hit the lock button while trying to turn up/down the volume and that is a bit annoying specially if you're watching something or playing a game.
customer_reviews.author: Hamlet

customer_reviews.title: The perfect tablet for everyday use~lightweight~beautiful screen picture.
customer_reviews.text: I have the larger 12" Samsung tablet but needed something a bit smaller and more lightweight to carry with me every day. This is that tablet and the screen is beautiful. It's the perfect tablet to throw in your bag without killing your shoulder or ruining the straps from such a heavy load. Waiting in line isn't a hassle anymore, I can easily pull out my tablet and read a book or browse a magazine. Very practical.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Noel

customer_reviews.title: I love the way this feels in my hands
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this feels in my hands. The problem with that is the bezel is so small (which I thought was a good thing) I have trouble holding it without touching active things on the screen. It's fast and light. The screen is really nice and so is the camera. There are some things I haven't figured out yet, but I'll figure it out eventually. I would buy again or reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: C. cooper

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and brilliant display
customer_reviews.text: I like a tablet that fits in my hand and is light weight. This one fits those requirements and has a super sharp display. The speed is very good as well. Upgrading the memory capacity has turned out to be a little bit of a challenge however as it takes a very specific microSD card according to the Samsung customer service rep I talked with. So far I have not been able to locate that card even from Samsung. All other aspects of this tablet fit my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Fam

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME TABLET!!!of those
customer_reviews.text: I had one of those budget tablets before but this Samsung Galaxy S 8.4 is awesome!..I can't imagine a more loaded tablet...beautiful screen quality,fast processor and perfect size at 8.4..I can't recommend this tablet more...Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Carrino

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Using it primarily to brows the internet in comfort of recliner, works flawlessly, size is right for holding in one hand, if there are any flaws, I haven't come across them yet. I am also using it at work, graphics are awesome and suitable for apps such as CAD-CAM, micro SD card is major advantage in storage capacity.
customer_reviews.author: VicK

customer_reviews.title: which is perfect for my uses
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to primarily use the kindle app. I am working on my BA degree and found that text books are cheaper through Kindle usually. It has plenty of features and operates similar to my Galaxy S5 phone, so it took less time to learn how to use it. The battery seems to last quite awhile, which is perfect for my uses.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: While the screen quality is amazing, this is the second one I've had and can say I'm extremely disappointed with the quality. Light use and now, in December, it will not charge. The same thing happened with my other Galaxy Tab. Samsung used to be better.
customer_reviews.author: Charlyg

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Update! Have taken this to 2 repair shops and they are NOT ABLE TO FIX! Do not waste you money on this! Original review->Had for less than 3 months. Now it won't charge----at all. Using the original charger plugged into wall.
customer_reviews.author: JnyGrl

customer_reviews.title: This is the tablet most people will be happy with. I know I am
customer_reviews.text: This is the tablet most people will be happy with. I know I am. It is a powerful device that is perfect in size. Not too small, not too large. You can get it in the 4G model to hook up to a wireless carrier, but until they allow you to use it as a phone/tablet, it is a waste of money unless you like paying those ridiculous data fees.
customer_reviews.author: TC-FL

customer_reviews.title: Good except for the battery life
customer_reviews.text: I really love this tablet but I'm having issues with the battery life. I bought this in May and it worked really well, I could watch several shows or movies without having to charge it. Now I can barely read a book for an hour without my battery going down by 80%. Is this covered by the warranty? Can I get this fixed or replaced? Clearly it has to be a manufacturing defect because I've already deactivated all the apps I could.
customer_reviews.author: JLWC

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Good while it lasted. Got clunky and then began resetting itself. I assume the lifespan of this to be about 2 years. Other than that, it was good while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet. Have used it daily for 3 years now. It is reliable, fast and durable. Has seen heavy use. Don't have anything bad to say about it except you will need a micro SD card as the 16 gb fill up quickly. Picture is great for watching movies.
customer_reviews.author: K. Meeks

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy is really thin and lite but has very good quality feel & appearance
customer_reviews.text: This is my first tablet so I can only compare it to my wife's ipad which is a lot bigger and heavier, Galaxy is really thin and lite but has very good quality feel & appearance. I really like having the back button on this thing which Apple doesn't have. The Galaxy is also louder at full volume which can be important when streaming in a large noisy kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Mason

customer_reviews.title: Specs/features this model has are VERY impressive
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 8.4 inch Galaxy S “Used” and I couldn’t ask for anything more. Tablet was in near perfect condition and the Specs/features this model has are VERY impressive, considering it was manufactured years ago and is so affordable now!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Best Electronics Buying Decision I've Ever Made!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Samsung Galaxy Tab S 8.4 ... and you will love yours. Go ahead! Order one. You'll be glad you did. Come join me and millions of other happy users. I don't work for Amazon or Samsung. I'm just a happy consumer.
customer_reviews.author: RichFinTX

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, not great.
customer_reviews.text: Unit is not as fast as my phone (Galaxy S6), the battery life is pretty short (I'm afraid of taking it off of power saving mode), and it doesn't not support all mkv files (for streaming purposes), but overall it is able to fill its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Beechey

customer_reviews.title: Goldilocks tablet
customer_reviews.text: I find this 8.4 tablet fits perfectly in one hand making it easy to use with the other. Having a 5.5 inch phone, there is enough of a step up to the tablet that I appreciate the larger form especially when watching movies. It sometimes feels a little slow to wake up and present the unlock screen. But once it's unlocked it behaves perfectly. I thought I would be annoyed by TouchWiz but it's actually pretty good. I would like to be rid of some of the bloatware, but buying from any major brand has this downside. The package arrived quickly and in perfect condition as you would expect.
customer_reviews.author: Arann Villing

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tablet
customer_reviews.text: I love my tablet, it allows me to read my documents with ease, use Skype and play games at the same time, with no lag; its size is ideal to carry it wherever is needed. If you have a Samsung Account, it will synchronize the apps/files if you choose to, so take this into consideration. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Víctor Hugo Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tablet in this size category !!
customer_reviews.text: The seller was outstanding. I would absolutely do business with them again !! The tablet works great, as expected. I love the size, features, and light weight. The graphics are amazing, and speed of this tablet is awesome. I would buy this same one all over again, if given the choice. Love it !!
customer_reviews.author: A. Eric Luce

customer_reviews.title: Way too much bloatware
customer_reviews.text: Great screen and performance. The amount of very annoying bloatware is unbelievable. I own 5 Galaxy devices and this one is the worst in this regard. Took me a few hours to disable most of it. There is no way to disable that widget screen without rooting, so I just installed the Google Now launcher.
customer_reviews.author: dp

customer_reviews.title: the size is great for my yoke mount
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for use as my GPS navigation aid while flying. I use Naviator with my homebuilt Stratux ADS-B. The image is phenominal, the size is great for my yoke mount!
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tablet
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is WOW. Love this tablet. The titanium bronze is awesome paired with the same color book cover case looks rich. Best purchase ever. The screen resolution is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Bonita L Howard

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Sharp screen, excellent rear camera, and good performance. The price is reasonable too. The fingerprint scanner might be a bit of a gimmick, but if you're concerned about how easily these can be defeated, you can just use a password. In any event it's certainly more secure than the 4- digit lock codes most people use, and faster too.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Great find my son loves it and it saved me ...
customer_reviews.text: Great find my son loves it and it saved me a bundle over a new one! thanks! These tabs are definitely the best around fast! easy to use not so easy to download to a mac if you have pics? more user friendly to a windows machine but that is the case for desktops as well.
customer_reviews.author: Everything_Art

customer_reviews.title: Dont like
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for almost a month and seems to be slow and have trouble contacting to the internet, I have reset it a number of times but does the same thing, I am returning it
customer_reviews.author: janice pickett

customer_reviews.title: Well crafted
customer_reviews.text: I like this tablet. The form factor and performance are top notch. The one dig is that battery life can't compete with my iPad. It's a great travel device as it fits in my wife's bag or a coat pocket. The extra size just makes it more usable than a phone.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Z

customer_reviews.title: Samsung has it go'n On!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced this for an Apple Promac laptop I had. The Price was great, the screen resolution is superb, and it does all I need!
customer_reviews.author: bootly3

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tablet. Just the right size. I checked out the 10.1 inch version and it was too big. The 8.4 inch one is just the right size. I have a Galaxy S5 and they are so very similar. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: boliver

customer_reviews.title: Best 8 inch tab IMO
customer_reviews.text: Got this to compliment my 10 inch Tab S. The bigger tab I use at home as a notebook replacement. I use the 8 inch as the ground station and monitor for my UAV work and for general field use. It's great using the same OS as my phone......all Samsung Android. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Josh K.

customer_reviews.title: Really top notch tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable screen! I have had it for about a month and think it has to be the best tablet right now. There have been only one or two times playing games where it actually seemed to bog down and I have played many hours on it so far. It may seem a bit pricey but the screen quality really makes it a value.
customer_reviews.author: Julie and Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Samsung, screens are amazing.
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't the newest, biggest, or fastest but it is doing everything we needed it to and so far we are getting pretty good battery life out of it. A great deal in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I am writing my review on this tablet. I got this to replace my Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 10.1. I left that it is a little bit smaller but still just as easy to see everything. The screen resolution is incredible and watching movies is a nice treat.
customer_reviews.author: KPreach

customer_reviews.title: This one is perfect! Screen quality is great - Have had it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Galaxy tablet - I had the 10.1 tab and wanted a smaller one - but did not want to go all the way down to a 7". This one is perfect! Screen quality is great - Have had it for 2 months and am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: but given the fact that this tablet is so amazing i had to write a review
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't write reviews, but given the fact that this tablet is so amazing i had to write a review. I thought i wouldn't like going from a full sized tablet to the "mini" tablet but this little guy does ten times what my old Asus tablet could do. I am so ecstatic about getting my new Asus dark knight router in the mail so i can have the capability of 5 ghz of connection for streaming video. Yeah i said 5ghz on things little guy! I love this tablet all around best one for purchase on the market
customer_reviews.author: Preston Brown

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Hope samsung keeps up the good work.
customer_reviews.text: For a used samsung tablet it works great. No scratches, dings, dents, or any blemishes. I'm. Very happy... It's been almost a year and it's still working great.
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: and so far it seems like it is as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It's my first tablet, and so far it seems like it is as advertised. Setup is very simple, it is lightweight and the display is bright and crisp. I'll leave it to the tech goons to tell you about the more technical performance qualities.
customer_reviews.author: DMG

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but slower than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Not bad but slower than I thought it would be. Takes longer than I'd like to switch between apps. Much slower than an Ipad.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Good picture, light weight
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Good picture, light weight, easy to use. The only issue I had was charging time. With the charger sent with the tablet it took 6 hours, or so, to charge the tablet. I bought a high speed charger and that cut the time down a couple hours.
customer_reviews.author: JWS

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S 8.4-Inch Tablet (16 GB, Titanium Bronze)
feature_bullets: Android 4.4 Kit Kat OS, 1.9 GHz Exynos 5 Octa Processor (1.9 GHz Quad Core + 1.3 GHz Quad Core)
16 GB Flash Memory, 3 GB RAM Memory. Wi-Fi ONLY, not 4G Compatible.
Camera: 8MP Rear with LED Flash + 2.1MP Front, Connectivity: ac dual band wifi
Super AMOLED Display with 2560x1600 WQXGA Resolution
Features Ultra Power Saving Mode and Fingerprint Scanner
